entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Fermont
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:37 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 04:56 AM AST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: E 46 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
